name: ValuationMethods
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: valuation methods
des:
This volume of the Value Tutor series tests your knowledge of business valuation approaches and valuation methods. 

Items reviewed in this volume include:

- Which approach to business valuation includes the discounted cash flow (DCF) method

- Which approach to business valuation includes the capitalization of earnings method

- Which approach to business valuation includes the excess earnings method 

- Which approach to business valuation includes the guideline public company method 

- Which approach to business valuation includes the adjusted net asset (or adjusted book value) method

- Which approach to business valuation includes the guideline transaction (or precedent transaction) method

- Which approach to business valuation includes the book value method

- Which approach to valuation includes prior transactions (or prior sales) of a subject company's securities?

Topics covered in other Value Tutor volumes include:
 
Duff & Phelps versus Stocks, Bills, Bonds and Inflation (SBBI also referred to as Ibbotson)

Capitalization of Earnings Method

Discounted Cash Flow Method of Valuation

Adjusted Net Asset Method of Valuation

Excess Earnings Method of Valuation

Guideline Publicly Traded Company Valuation Method

Completed Transaction (also known as the Guideline Transaction) Valuation Method 

Discounts for Lack of Marketability (DLOMs)

Discounts for Lack of Control (DLOC)

Option Pricing Method

Estate Valuations

Gift Valuations

FLIPS (Family Limited Partnerships) Valuations

Topic 820 (Accounting Fair Value) Valuations

Earn-out Valuations 

Valuing Contingent Consideration

M&A Valuations

Intangible Valuations
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
